title: Condominium for rent
neighborhood: memphis TN off Austin Peay Hwy.
posting_body: Townhouse or condo $750.00 rent and $600.00 deposit.
Two floors wooden floors upstairs and ceramic floors downstairs.
Two bathrooms, one downstairs the upstairs bathroom has a bath tap, and shower.
The living room and huge kitchen area are downstairs.
No appliances however we have some appliances for tenant use and ask that the renter leave the appliances as they found them.
Laundry space is available inside the premise.
In the process of installing window air conditioners, faced nice size backyard, great for barbeque and private.
unfurnished laundry room inside the premises, parking in front of the rented condo.
The renter or tenant takes care of the ground in the front and back of the condo.
Prior arrangement for showing Only for interested renters.
A credit check for all renters is required and for their references.
Renters are required to pay for a credit check.
We recommend that you sent an email for interest and will get back to those interested.
(See parking in Infront of the premise and laundry space inside the premise).
This condo is about 5 minutes from Kroger, Aldi, the post office, library, and Austin Peay Police station.
